thumb.title: Object [original song, Vocaloid, Sarah/Akito]
thumb.description: "Object" is about anthropomorphism, particularly the tougher parts of robot training. Why not just let them be good at robotics?LyricsI think that I'mIncapable of thoughtI craft and workAs that's what I've been taughtBut see no joy in Rothko or MatisseTheir brushstrokes leave me coldA value you can't teachTeach me to feel painTeach me how to loveI think that I'mIncapable of deep thoughtI craft and workAs that's what I've been taughtBut see no joy in Rothko or MatisseTheir brushstrokes leave me coldCannot learn meTeach me painShow me love#vocaloid #sarah #akito #synthpop
